title: Issue with sending player ticket
body: I tried to send a player ticket for the previous my shop offers, but upon sending it redirected to  my open tickets with the message in the top right."Request not found. You do not have access to request #0. It may have been solved or deleted" When I tried sending another ticket about this ticket problem, the same message was displayed

replies.body: Are you logged into the ticketing center?  If not then the ticket would not yield.  Were you looking to get items from your first set, or something else?
From here https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new . I was looking to get 2 offers that were in the first set.

I can help you with that!  Here is your first set:

• TPA Ezreal - 60% - Discount Price: 300 RP				
• Snow Day Bard - 60% - Discount Price: 540 RP				
• Mecha Kha'Zix - 50% - Discount Price: 675 RP				
• Gangster Twitch - 30% - Discount Price: 682.5 RP				
• Enchanted Galio - 40% - Discount Price: 312 RP				
• Dragonslayer Braum - 60% - Discount Price: 390 RP				

Let me know which ones you wanted, and be sure to have the RP on your account!  :D
The snow day bard and mecha  kha zixs. Thanks.
You got it!  1215 RP has been removed, and the skins unlocked!
